vsParam:
Uh, guys. I want to take this commission...
But I can't do it alone. Will you help me?

Sure, no problem. Let's see...
"Please gather some crystals for my wizardry accelerant"...

"They should be as transparent and clear as possible"...
Wow, that's quite challenging...

Yes. Crystal itself is not hard to find,
but accelerant crystal is rather rare.

The composition and transparency of the crystal affect the
results of wizardry, it's very hard to find suitable crystals.

Thank you for your elaboration. You know this stuff
better than me... So, what do we do?

Places with highly transparent crystals...
Is there any such place nearby?

Uh... I know a place that might have the crystals,
but I can't get there on my own...

That's why I want you guys to come along...
Would... it be too much trouble for you guys?

Ah, it's... alright...
I... I am fine with it, what about you guys?

What, what satyr!
I didn't mean anything else!? Really!
It's uncommon for Anis to ask for help from us.

You are right! 
That's exactly what I meant!

Why do you say that!
I already said I meant nothing else!!

Relax, the satyr thing aside first... Anis.
Where's that place?

It's in the Ateria region.
The specific location remains a mystery to me too...

But this client seems to be in dire need of these crystals,
I really want to help him!

I see.
Uh-huh, you are really kind-hearted, Anis.

We should go to Ateria first and ask the locals.
Let's go, and leave Cresson the Satyr here.

Hmm, can we end this topic!?
Hey, wait! I am going too! Hey!!
